title: Decorative Square, 1902-1-140, 3rd–4th century
medium:
Medium: Warp; S-spun Z-twist linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wool. 
Technique: slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping and supplementary weft loops
description: Purple square at the center filled with geometric tile-like pattern. Edged with border of senna knot loops.
